code: import React from'react';import{Tr,Td,Image,Flex,Text,Progress,Button,Avatar,useColorModeValue,Badge}from"@chakra-ui/react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TablesTableRow(props){var logo=props.logo,name=props.name,email=props.email,subdomain=props.subdomain,domain=props.domain,status=props.status,date=props.date;var textColor=useColorModeValue("gray.700","white");var bgStatus=useColorModeValue("gray.400","#1a202c");var colorStatus=useColorModeValue("white","gray.400");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Tr,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Td,{minWidth:{sm:"250px"},pl:"0px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{align:"center",py:".8rem",minWidth:"100%",flexWrap:"nowrap",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{src:logo,w:"50px",borderRadius:"12px",mr:"18px"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{direction:"column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"md",color:textColor,fontWeight:"bold",minWidth:"100%",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"sm",color:"gray.400",fontWeight:"normal",children:email})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Td,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{direction:"column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"md",color:textColor,fontWeight:"bold",children:domain}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"sm",color:"gray.400",fontWeight:"normal",children:subdomain})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Td,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Badge,{bg:status==="Online"?"green.400":bgStatus,color:status==="Online"?"white":colorStatus,fontSize:"16px",p:"3px 10px",borderRadius:"8px",children:status})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Td,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"md",color:textColor,fontWeight:"bold",pb:".5rem",children:date})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Td,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{p:"0px",bg:"transparent",variant:"no-hover",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"md",color:"gray.400",fontWeight:"bold",cursor:"pointer",children:"Edit"})})})]});}export default TablesTableRow;

sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import {Tr, Td, Image, Flex, Text, Progress, Button, Avatar, useColorModeValue, Badge} from "@chakra-ui/react"; function TablesTableRow(props) { const {logo, name, email, subdomain, domain, status, date} = props; const textColor = useColorModeValue("gray.700", "white"); const bgStatus = useColorModeValue("gray.400", "#1a202c"); const colorStatus = useColorModeValue("white", "gray.400") return ( {name} {email} {domain} {subdomain} {status} {date} ) } export default TablesTableRow
